headline: Grand Hyatt Washington Unveils New Guest Rooms, Suites and Expanded Grand Club Lounge Amid Transformative Multi-Million Dollar Renovation
summary: WASHINGTON, June 26, 2025--Grand Hyatt Washington, an upscale hotel in downtown Washington D.C., is proud to announce the unveiling of its newly renovated 902 guest rooms, 31 reimagined suites and expanded Grand Club lounge, marking a significant milestone in the hotel’s multi-million dollar transformation. This ambitious renovation delivers bold and vibrant design and architecture into modern spaces while upholding a strong focus on sustainability and iconic guest experience.

This ambitious renovation delivers bold and vibrant design and architecture into modern spaces while upholding a strong focus on sustainability and iconic guest experience.
